titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the soule and spirit of man Wherein is described the essence and dignity thereof, the gifts and graces wherewith God hath endued it, and the estate thereof, aswell present as future. And thereunto is annexed in the end a bipartite instruction, or exhortation, concerning the duties of our thankfulnesse towards God. Written by Simon Harvvard.
titleStmt.author: Harward, Simon, fl. 1572-1614.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the soule and spirit of man Wherein is described the essence and dignity thereof, the gifts and graces wherewith God hath endued it, and the estate thereof, aswell present as future. And thereunto is annexed in the end a bipartite instruction, or exhortation, concerning the duties of our thankfulnesse towards God. Written by Simon Harvvard.
titleStmt.author: Harward, Simon, fl. 1572-1614.

notesStmt.note: In two parts; part 2 has separate dated title page, reading: Two sermons of the duties of our thankfulnes towardes God.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
